name: Reinforcing Memory Boost!
effect: [Main] Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Place 1 of them on top of your security stack face down. Add the remaining card to your hand. Then, place this card in your battle area.[Main] ＜Delay＞ (Trash this card in your battle area to activate the effect below. You can't activate this effect the turn this card enters play.)・Gain 3 memory.
security_effect: [Security] Place this card in its owner's battle area.
